name: CLKComplicationTemplateModularLargeColumns
desc: A template for displaying multiple columns of data.

items.name: init(row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row3Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row3Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template that has two columns of text.

items.name: init(row1ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?, row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?, row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row3ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?, row3Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider, row3Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a template that has a column of images and two columns of text.

items.name: var row1ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?
items.desc: An optional image to display at the beginning of the first row.

items.name: var row1Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the first column of the first row.

items.name: var row1Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the second column of the first row.

items.name: var row2ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?
items.desc: An optional image to display at the beginning of the second row.

items.name: var row2Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the first column of the second row.

items.name: var row2Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the second column of the second row.

items.name: var row3ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?
items.desc: An optional image to display at the beginning of the third row.

items.name: var row3Column1TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the first column of the third row.

items.name: var row3Column2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the second column of the third row.

items.name: var column2Alignment: CLKComplicationColumnAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the text in the second column.
